cab.content: HIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY1 S GOVERNMENT).ECSET..? 20 (51).COPY NO.CABINST. DATE OF PROPOSED IMPERIAL ECONOMIC CONFERENCE AT OTTAWA. Note by the Secretary of State for Dominion Affairs. I circulate herewith, for consideration in connectionwith Item 3 of the Agenda for the Meeting of the Cabineton January 23th, 1931, the following paraphrase of atelegram which I have received from the Prime Ministerof Canada.Secret, Personal. I would appreciate greatly,in view of the necessity owing to claims ofConventions and tourists of providing well inadvance for hotel accommodation, suggestion ofabout when you think it would be desirable that economic Conference should be held. R.B.Bennett.Secretary of State for External Affairs. "(Intld,) J.H.T.Dominions Office, S.W.I. January 27th, 1931.
